description: This file defines a Message class and a MessageType enum for a kindergarten management system's frontend. It models message data, including message type, sender, recipient, timestamps, read status, and importance, with methods for serialization, copying, and display.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: A class representing a message with various attributes such as title, content, type, sender, recipient, timestamp, and flags for read and importance, along with serialization and utility methods.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes the Message object into a Map for storage or transmission.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a Message instance from a Map.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Message with optional modifications to its fields.
